title: Add agent
name: PostAddAgentId

Parameter.description: If this is not included, the API will get the IP automatically. If you are behind a proxy, you must set the option config.BehindProxyServer to yes at config.js.
Remove the old agent with the same IP if disconnected since seconds.

description: Add a new agent.

title: Insert agent
name: PostInsertAgent

Parameter.description: If this is not included, the API will get the IP automatically. If you are behind a proxy, you must set the option config.BehindProxyServer to yes at config.js.
Agent key. Minimum length: 64 characters. Allowed values: ^[a-zA-Z0-9]+$
Remove the old agent the with same IP if disconnected since seconds.

description: Insert an agent with an existing id and key.

title: Add agent (quick method)
name: PutAddAgentName
description: Adds a new agent with name :agent_name. This agent will use ANY as IP.

title: Clear rootcheck database
name: DeleteRootcheck
description: Clears the rootcheck database for all agents.

title: Clear rootcheck database of an agent
name: DeleteRootcheckAgentId
description: Clears the rootcheck database for a specific agent.

title: Clear syscheck database
name: DeleteSyscheck
description: Clears the syscheck database for all agents.

title: Clear syscheck database of an agent
name: DeleteSyscheckAgentId
description: Clears the syscheck database for the specified agent.

title: Run an AR command in the agent
name: PutARAgentIdCommand
description: Runs an Active Response command on a specified agent

title: Get active configuration
name: GetConfig
description: Returns the active configuration in JSON format.

title: Get the cluster configuration
name: GetClusterconfig
description: Returns the cluster configuration

title: Get node node_id's configuration
name: GetManagerConfiguration

Parameter.description: Indicates the ossec.conf section: global, rules, syscheck, rootcheck, remote, alerts, command, active-response, localfile.
Indicates a section child, e.g, fields for rule section are: include, decoder_dir, etc.

description: Returns ossec.conf in JSON format.

title: Get manager configuration
name: GetManagerConfiguration

Parameter.description: Indicates the ossec.conf section: global, rules, syscheck, rootcheck, remote, alerts, command, active-response, localfile.
Indicates a section child, e.g, fields for rule section are: include, decoder_dir, etc.

description: Returns ossec.conf in JSON format.

title: Delete an agent
name: DeleteAgentId

Parameter.description: Delete an agent from the key store.

description: Removes an agent.

title: Delete agents
name: DeleteAgents

Parameter.description: Delete an agent from the key store.
Filters by agent status. Use commas to enter multiple statuses.
Filters out disconnected agents for longer than specified. Time in seconds, '[n_days]d', '[n_hours]h', '[n_minutes]m' or '[n_seconds]s'. For never connected agents, uses the register date.

description: Removes agents, using a list of them or a criterion based on the status or time of the last connection. The Wazuh API must be restarted after removing an agent.

title: Delete a list of groups
name: DeleteAgentsGroups
description: Removes a list of groups.

title: Delete cache index
name: DeleteCache
description: Clears entire cache.

title: Clear group cache
name: DeleteCacheGroup
description: Clears cache of the specified group.

title: Get sync status of agent
name: GetSync
description: Returns the sync status in JSON format

title: Remove all agent groups.
name: DeleteGroupAgent
description: Removes the group of the agent. The agent will automatically revert to the 'default' group.

title: Remove a single group of an agent
name: DeleteGroupAgent
description: Remove the group of the agent but will leave the rest of its group if it belongs to a multigroup.

title: Remove a single group of multiple agents
name: DeleteGroupAgents
description: Remove a list of agents of a group

title: Remove group
name: DeleteGroupAgents
description: Removes the group. Agents that were assigned to the removed group will automatically revert to the 'default' group.

title: Get group configuration
name: GetAgentGroupConfiguration

Parameter.description: First element to return in the collection.

description: Returns the group configuration (agent.conf).

title: Get a file in group
name: GetAgentGroupFile
description: Returns the specified file belonging to the group parsed to JSON.

title: Get group files
name: GetAgentGroupFiles

Parameter.description: First element to return in the collection.
Sorts the collection by a field or fields (separated by comma). Use +/- at the beginning to list in ascending or descending order.
Looks for elements with the specified string.
Hash algorithm to use to calculate files checksums.

description: Returns the files belonging to the group.

title: Get agents in a group
name: GetAgentGroupID

Parameter.description: First element to return in the collection.
Select which fields to return (separated by comma).
Sorts the collection by a field or fields (separated by comma). Use +/- at the beginning to list in ascending or descending order.
Looks for elements with the specified string.

description: Returns the list of agents in a group.

title: Get groups
name: GetAgentGroups

Parameter.description: First element to return in the collection.
Sorts the collection by a field or fields (separated by comma). Use +/- at the beginning to list in ascending or descending order.
Looks for elements with the specified string.

description: Returns the list of existing agent groups.

title: Get agents without group
name: GetAgentsWithoutGroup

Parameter.description: First element to return in the collection.
Select which fields to return (separated by comma).
Sorts the collection by a field or fields (separated by comma). Use +/- at the beginning to list in ascending or descending order.
Looks for elements with the specified string.
Query to filter result. For example q="status=Active"

description: Returns a list with the available agents without group.

title: Put configuration file (agent.conf) into a group
name: PostAgentGroupConfiguration
description: Upload the group configuration (agent.conf).

title: Upload file into a group
name: PostAgentGroupFile
description: Upload a file to a group.

title: Add a list of agents to a group
name: PostGroupAgents
description: Adds a list of agents to the specified group.

title: Create a group
name: PutGroup
description: Creates a new group.

title: Add agent group
name: PutGroupAgent

Parameter.description: Wheter to append new group to current agent's group or replace it.

description: Adds an agent to the specified group.

title: Get hardware info of all agents
name: GetHardware

Parameter.description: First element to return in the collection.
Sorts the collection by a field or fields (separated by comma). Use +/- at the beginning to list in ascending or descending order.
Looks for elements with the specified string.

description: Returns the agent's hardware info

title: Get hardware info
name: GetHardware_agent
description: Returns the agent's hardware info

title: Get all agents
name: GetAgents

Parameter.description: First element to return in the collection.
Select which fields to return (separated by comma).
Sorts the collection by a field or fields (separated by comma). Use +/- at the beginning to list in ascending or descending order.
Looks for elements with the specified string.
Filters by agent status. Use commas to enter multiple statuses.
Query to filter results by. For example q="status=Active"
Filters out disconnected agents for longer than specified. Time in seconds, '[n_days]d', '[n_hours]h', '[n_minutes]m' or '[n_seconds]s'. For never connected agents, uses the register date.
Filters by manager hostname to which agents are connected.

description: Returns a list with the available agents.

title: Get an agent
name: GetAgentsID
description: Returns various information from an agent.

title: Get an agent by its name
name: GetAgentsName
description: Returns various information from an agent called :agent_name.

title: Get agents summary
name: GetAgentsSummary
description: Returns a summary of the available agents.

title: Get cache index
name: GetCache
description: Returns current cache index.

title: Return cache configuration
name: GetCacheConfiguration
description: Returns cache configuration.

title: Get info about cluster status
name: GetClusterstatus
description: Returns whether the cluster is enabled or disabled

title: Get all decoders
name: GetDecoders

Parameter.description: First element to return in the collection.
Sorts the collection by a field or fields (separated by comma). Use +/- at the beginning to list in ascending or descending order.
Looks for elements with the specified string.

description: Returns all decoders included in ossec.conf.

title: Get all decoders files
name: GetDecodersFiles

Parameter.description: First element to return in the collection.
Sorts the collection by a field or fields (separated by comma). Use +/- at the beginning to list in ascending or descending order.
Looks for elements with the specified string.

description: Returns all decoders files included in ossec.conf.

title: Get decoders by name
name: GetDecodersName

Parameter.description: First element to return in the collection.
Sorts the collection by a field or fields (separated by comma). Use +/- at the beginning to list in ascending or descending order.
Looks for elements with the specified string.

description: Returns the decoders with the specified name.

title: Get all parent decoders
name: GetDecodersParents

Parameter.description: First element to return in the collection.
Sorts the collection by a field or fields (separated by comma). Use +/- at the beginning to list in ascending or descending order.
Looks for elements with the specified string.

description: Returns all parent decoders included in ossec.conf

title: Show cluster health
name: GetHealthcheck
description: Show cluster health

title: Get node_id's information
name: GetManagerInfo
description: Returns basic information about manager.

title: Get manager information
name: GetManagerInfo
description: Returns basic information about manager.

title: Get node node_id's status
name: GetManagerStatus
description: Returns the status of the manager processes.

title: Get manager status
name: GetManagerStatus
description: Returns the status of the manager processes.

title: Get OS summary
name: GetOSSummary

Parameter.description: First element to return in the collection.
Sorts the collection by a field or fields (separated by comma). Use +/- at the beginning to list in ascending or descending order.
Looks for elements with the specified string.
Query to filter result. For example q="status=Active"

description: Returns a summary of the OS.

title: Get rootcheck database
name: GetRootcheckAgent

Parameter.description: First element to return in the collection.
Sorts the collection by a field or fields (separated by comma). Use +/- at the beginning to list in ascending or descending order.
Looks for elements with the specified string.

description: Returns the rootcheck database of an agent.

title: Get rootcheck CIS requirements
name: GetRootcheckAgentCIS

Parameter.description: First element to return in the collection.
Sorts the collection by a field or fields (separated by comma). Use +/- at the beginning to list in ascending or descending order.
Looks for elements with the specified string.

description: Returns the CIS requirements of all rootchecks of the specified agent.

title: Get last rootcheck scan
name: GetRootcheckAgentLastScan
description: Returns the timestamp of the last rootcheck scan.

title: Get rootcheck pci requirements
name: GetRootcheckAgentPCI

Parameter.description: First element to return in the collection.
Sorts the collection by a field or fields (separated by comma). Use +/- at the beginning to list in ascending or descending order.
Looks for elements with the specified string.

description: Returns the PCI requirements of all rootchecks of the agent.

title: Get all rules
name: GetRules

Parameter.description: First element to return in the collection.
Sorts the collection by a field or fields (separated by comma). Use +/- at the beginning to list in ascending or descending order.
Looks for elements with the specified string.
Filters the rules by level. level=2 or level=2-5.

description: Returns all rules.

title: Get files of rules
name: GetRulesFiles

Parameter.description: First element to return in the collection.
Sorts the collection by a field or fields (separated by comma). Use +/- at the beginning to list in ascending or descending order.
Looks for elements with the specified string.

description: Returns the files of all rules.

title: Get rule gdpr requirements
name: GetRulesGdpr

Parameter.description: First element to return in the collection.
Sorts the collection by a field or fields (separated by comma). Use +/- at the beginning to list in ascending or descending order.
Looks for elements with the specified string.

description: Returns the GDPR requirements of all rules.

title: Get rule groups
name: GetRulesGroups

Parameter.description: First element to return in the collection.
Sorts the collection by a field or fields (separated by comma). Use +/- at the beginning to list in ascending or descending order.
Looks for elements with the specified string.

description: Returns the groups of all rules.

title: Get rules by id
name: GetRulesId

Parameter.description: First element to return in the collection.
Sorts the collection by a field or fields (separated by comma). Use +/- at the beginning to list in ascending or descending order.
Looks for elements with the specified string.

description: Returns the rules with the specified id.

title: Get rule pci requirements
name: GetRulesPci

Parameter.description: First element to return in the collection.
Sorts the collection by a field or fields (separated by comma). Use +/- at the beginning to list in ascending or descending order.
Looks for elements with the specified string.

description: Returns the PCI requirements of all rules.

title: Get syscheck files
name: GetSyscheckAgent

Parameter.description: First element to return in the collection.
Sorts the collection by a field or fields (separated by comma). Use +/- at the beginning to list in ascending or descending order.
Looks for elements with the specified string.
Returns the files with the specified md5 hash.
Returns the files with the specified sha1 hash.
Returns the files with the specified sha256 hash.
Returns the files with the specified hash (md5, sha1 or sha256).

description: Returns the syscheck files of an agent.

title: Get last syscheck scan
name: GetSyscheckAgentLastScan
description: Return the timestamp of the last syscheck scan.

title: Get agent key
name: GetAgentsKey
description: Returns the key of an agent.

title: Get ossec.log
name: GetManagerLogs

Parameter.description: First element to return in the collection.
Sorts the collection by a field or fields (separated by comma). Use +/- at the beginning to list in ascending or descending order.
Looks for elements with the specified string.

description: Returns the three last months of ossec.log.

Parameter.description: First element to return in the collection.
Sorts the collection by a field or fields (separated by comma). Use +/- at the beginning to list in ascending or descending order.
Looks for elements with the specified string.

description: Returns the three last months of ossec.log.

description: Returns a summary of the last three months of the ossec.log file.

title: Get summary of ossec.log from a specific node in cluster.
name: GetManagerLogsSummaryCluster
description: Returns a summary of the last three months of the ossec.log file.

title: Run rootcheck scan in all agents
name: PutRootcheck
description: Runs syscheck and rootcheck on all agents (Wazuh launches both processes simultaneously).

title: Run rootcheck scan in an agent
name: PutRootcheckAgentId
description: Runs syscheck and rootcheck on a specified agent (Wazuh launches both processes simultaneously)

title: Run syscheck scan in all agents
name: PutSyscheck
description: Runs syscheck and rootcheck on all agents (Wazuh launches both processes simultaneously).

title: Run syscheck scan in an agent
name: PutSyscheckAgentId
description: Runs syscheck and rootcheck on an agent (Wazuh launches both processes simultaneously).

title: Get analysisd stats
name: GetAnalysisdStats
description: Returns a summary of the current analysisd stats.

title: Get manager stats
name: GetManagerStats

Parameter.description: Selects the date for getting the statistical information. Format: YYYYMMDD

description: Returns Wazuh statistical information for the current or specified date.

title: Get node node_id's stats
name: GetManagerStatsCluster

Parameter.description: Selects the date for getting the statistical information. Format: YYYYMMDD

description: Returns Wazuh statistical information for the current or specified date.

title: Get node node_id's stats
name: GetManagerStatsCluster
description: Returns a summary of the current analysisd stats on the node.

title: Get node node_id's stats
name: GetManagerStatsCluster
description: Returns a summary of the current remoted stats on the node.

title: Get manager stats by hour
name: GetManagerStatsHourly
description: Returns Wazuh statistical information per hour. Each number in the averages field represents the average of alerts per hour.

title: Get node node_id's stats by hour
name: GetManagerStatsHourlyCluster
description: Returns Wazuh statistical information per hour. Each number in the averages field represents the average of alerts per hour.

title: Get manager stats by week
name: GetManagerStatsWeekly
description: Returns Wazuh statistical information per week. Each number in the hours field represents the average alerts per hour for that specific day.

title: Get node node_id's stats by week
name: GetManagerStatsWeeklyCluster
description: Returns Wazuh statistical information per week. Each number in the hours field represents the average alerts per hour for that specific day.

title: Get remoted stats
name: GetRemotedStats
description: Returns a summary of the current remoted stats.

title: Get distinct fields in agents
name: GetdistinctAgents

Parameter.description: First element to return in the collection.
Sorts the collection by a field or fields (separated by comma). Use +/- at the beginning to list in ascending or descending order.
Looks for elements with the specified string.
Query to filter result. For example q="status=Active"

description: Returns all the different combinations that agents have for the selected fields. It also indicates the total number of agents that have each combination.

title: Get outdated agents
name: GetOutdatedAgents

Parameter.description: First element to return in the collection.
Sorts the collection by a field or fields (separated by comma). Use +/- at the beginning to list in ascending or descending order.
Query to filter result. For example q="status=Active"

description: Returns the list of outdated agents.

title: Get upgrade result from agent
name: GetUpgradeResult

Parameter.description: Seconds to wait for the agent to respond.

description: Returns the upgrade result from an agent.

title: Upgrade agent using custom file
name: PutAgentsUpgradeCustomId

Parameter.description: Path to the WPK file. The file must be on a folder on the Wazuh's installation directory (by default, /var/ossec).

description: Upgrade the agent using a custom file.

title: Upgrade agent using online repository
name: PutAgentsUpgradeId

Parameter.description: Use protocol http. If it's false use https. By default the value is set to false.

description: Upgrade the agent using a WPK file from online repository.
